text: Houlton is a town in Aroostook County, Maine, on the Canadaâ€“US border, located at . As of the 2020 census, the town's population was 6,055. Houlton is the county seat of Aroostook County, and as such its nickname is the "Shire Town". ==References== Category:Towns in Maine Category:County seats in Maine
title: Houlton, Maine
